SEARCH
Package main.domain.models.events

Class BoxOffice

java.lang.Object
main.domain.models.events.BoxOffice
public class BoxOffice extends Object
Represents a box office for selling and refunding event tickets.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BoxOffice(Ticket ticket)
    Constructs a new BoxOffice with the specified ticket sample and default capacity and sales.
